name: PainCatastrophizing
title: Pain Catastrophizing
description: The degree to which the person experiences maladaptive, negative orientation toward actual or anticipated pain experiences. (Business ID: Entry 1737415)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Pain Catastrophizing.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an the degree to which the person experiences maladaptive, negative orientation toward actual or anticipated pain experiences..),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Pain Catastrophizing.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Pain Catastrophizing.)
